Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $8000 to me, reflecting its quality, functionality, and the time invested in its creation. Considering its unique benefits and the high standards it upholds, I propose a price of $7500 for you to experience all it has to offer. I believe this is an excellent opportunity for you to acquire something truly special at a competitive price. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
